title: Long-lost brothers reunite through DNA testing
text:
Long-lost brothers reunite through DNA testing Wednesday, March 28, 2018 - 03:45 
Using DNA matching website MyHeritage, Richard Emery reunites with his half-brother Paul Hannan for the first time in 51 years. Roselle Chen reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Using DNA matching website MyHeritage, Richard Emery reunites with his half-brother Paul Hannan for the first time in 51 years. Roselle Chen reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2J3Q4kQ
